bioconda.name: bioconductor-synergyfinder
bioconda.summary: Calculate and Visualize Synergy Scores for Drug Combinations

biotools.summary: Efficient implementations for all the popular synergy scoring models for drug combinations, including HSA, Loewe, Bliss and ZIP and visualization of the synergy scores as either a two-dimensional or a three-dimensional interaction surface over the dose matrix. R package available at https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/synergyfinder.html. The web server is available at http://www.synergyfinder.org or http://www.synergyfinderplus.org

bioschemas.name: SynergyFinder plus (SynergyFinder+)
bioschemas.summary: Efficient implementations for all the popular synergy scoring models for drug combinations, including HSA, Loewe, Bliss and ZIP and visualization of the synergy scores as either a two-dimensional or a three-dimensional interaction surface over the dose matrix. R package available at https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/synergyfinder.html. The web server is available at http://www.synergyfinder.org or http://www.synergyfinderplus.org
